mapper.select: select u.id, u.username, u.sex, d.name, u.birth, u.email, u.phone_number, u.status from tb_user u inner join tb_department d on u.department_id = d.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select u.id, u.username, u.nickname, u.email, u.avatar, u.phone_number, IF(u.status = 0, '锁定', '有效') status, CASE u.sex WHEN 0 THEN '男' WHEN 1 THEN '女' ELSE '保密' END sex, d.name, IF(u.type = 0, '超级管理员', '系统用户') type, u.birth, u.version, IF(u.deleted = 0, '未删除', '已删除') deleted, u.create_time, u.modified_time from tb_user u inner join tb_department d on u.department_id = d.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
select u.id, u.username from tb_user u inner join tb_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id where ur.role_id = (select id from tb_role where role_name = '部门主任')
